content:
I tried this, simple enough but still the same problem. The deleted files are in fact put in the trash folder on my phone app but they are not moved to the trash folder on the server folder. The odd thing is if i move a file from my inbox to another folder it in fact does move on the server as well.

I have the Tbird app for my laptop and it works perfectly.
creator: fmjack
